GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.9.321
GSD.description:
ARM: Fix refcount leak in axxia_boot_secondary

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.321 by commit a9b76c232a1ce4cbf27862097f7eb634dcc779eb, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 1d22924e1c4e299337e86e290c02c3e3eb43b608. For more details please see the references link.
